questions.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
questions.prompt: Given a string, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
followups: What invariant does the window maintain?
How does Unicode affect your solution?

questions.title: Kth Largest Element
questions.prompt: Find the kth largest element in an unsorted array.
followups: How would you handle streaming data?

questions.title: Merge Intervals
questions.prompt: Merge overlapping intervals.

questions.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
questions.prompt: Return the level order traversal of a binary tree.
followups: How do you modify it for zigzag?

questions.title: Detect Cycle in Graph
questions.prompt: Detect if a graph contains a cycle.
followups: How do you track visited states?

questions.title: Product of Array Except Self
questions.prompt: Return an array where each element is the product of all other elements.

questions.title: Design a Simple Cache
questions.prompt: Design a basic cache with get and put.

questions.title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
questions.prompt: Search a target in a rotated sorted array.

questions.title: Backtracking: Permutations
questions.prompt: Generate all permutations of a list of numbers.

questions.title: Design URL Shortener
questions.prompt: Design a URL shortening service.

questions.title: Thread Safety Basics
questions.prompt: Explain race conditions and how to avoid them.

questions.title: Top K Frequent Elements
questions.prompt: Return the k most frequent elements in an array.

questions.title: Design Metrics for a Feature
questions.prompt: Pick a Google product feature and define success metrics.

questions.title: Implement Trie
questions.prompt: Implement a trie with insert and search.

questions.title: Matrix Traversal
questions.prompt: Traverse a matrix in spiral order.

questions.title: Find Duplicate Number
questions.prompt: Find the duplicate number in an array without modifying it.

questions.title: Design Logging System
questions.prompt: Design a logging system for a backend service.

questions.title: Validate Binary Search Tree
questions.prompt: Check if a binary tree is a valid BST.

questions.title: Handling Large Data Files
questions.prompt: How do you process files larger than memory?

questions.title: Behavioral: Learning Fast
questions.prompt: Tell me about a time you had to learn something complex quickly.

questions.title: 3Sum
questions.prompt: Given an integer array nums, return all triplets that sum to zero.
followups: How do you avoid duplicate triplets?
How would you extend this to 4Sum?

questions.title: Container With Most Water
questions.prompt: Given n non-negative integers representing heights, find two lines that together with x-axis form a container holding the most water.
followups: Why does the two-pointer approach work?

questions.title: Generate Parentheses
questions.prompt: Given n pairs of parentheses, generate all valid combinations.

questions.title: Word Break
questions.prompt: Given a string and a dictionary of words, determine if the string can be segmented into dictionary words.
followups: How would you return all possible segmentations?

questions.title: Number of Islands
questions.prompt: Given a 2D grid of '1's and '0's, count the number of islands.
followups: How would you handle diagonal connections?

questions.title: Rotting Oranges
questions.prompt: Given a grid with fresh and rotten oranges, return minimum minutes until no fresh oranges remain.
followups: How do you handle multiple sources?
What if some oranges never rot?

questions.title: Course Schedule
questions.prompt: Given numCourses and prerequisites, determine if all courses can be finished.
followups: How would you return the course order?

questions.title: Course Schedule II
questions.prompt: Return the ordering of courses to take all courses.
followups: How does the algorithm differ from cycle detection?
What if multiple valid orders exist?

questions.title: Design Google Search Autocomplete
questions.prompt: Design an autocomplete system that returns top k suggestions for a prefix.
followups: How do you store and update frequencies?
How do you handle memory constraints?

questions.title: Design Google Docs
questions.prompt: Design a collaborative document editing system at a high level.
followups: How do you handle concurrent edits?
How do you handle offline editing?

questions.title: Design Google Maps ETA
questions.prompt: How would you estimate travel time between two locations?
followups: How do you handle real-time traffic?
How do you compute the shortest path?

questions.title: Design Google Photos
questions.prompt: Design a photo storage and sharing system at a high level.
followups: How do you store large files efficiently?

questions.title: Design YouTube
questions.prompt: Design a video streaming platform at a high level.
followups: How do you handle video encoding?

questions.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
questions.prompt: Find the longest palindromic substring in a given string.
followups: What is the time complexity of each?
How would you handle very long strings?

questions.title: Unique Paths
questions.prompt: Count the number of unique paths from top-left to bottom-right in a grid moving only down or right.

questions.title: Jump Game
questions.prompt: Determine if you can reach the last index given maximum jump lengths at each position.
followups: How would you find minimum jumps?

questions.title: Jump Game II
questions.prompt: Find the minimum number of jumps to reach the last index.
followups: How does BFS on intervals work?
Can you do it in O(1) space?

questions.title: Set Matrix Zeroes
questions.prompt: If an element in a matrix is zero, set its entire row and column to zero in O(1) space.
followups: How do you avoid overwriting state?
What is the first row/column trick?

questions.title: Spiral Matrix
questions.prompt: Return all elements of a matrix in spiral order.
followups: How would you generate a spiral matrix?

questions.title: Subsets
questions.prompt: Given an array of unique integers, return all possible subsets.

questions.title: Subsets II
questions.prompt: Given an array with duplicates, return all unique subsets.

questions.title: Combination Sum
questions.prompt: Find all unique combinations that sum to target, with unlimited use of candidates.
followups: How does it differ from bounded usage?

questions.title: Combination Sum II
questions.prompt: Find all unique combinations that sum to target, with each number used at most once.
followups: How do you avoid duplicate combinations?

questions.title: Permutations II
questions.prompt: Generate all unique permutations of a list with duplicates.
followups: How do you prune duplicate branches?

questions.title: Decode Ways
questions.prompt: Count the number of ways to decode a digit string (A=1, B=2, ... Z=26).
followups: How do you handle leading zeros?

questions.title: House Robber
questions.prompt: Find maximum amount you can rob from non-adjacent houses.

questions.title: House Robber II
questions.prompt: Same as House Robber but houses are arranged in a circle.
followups: How do you break the circular dependency?

questions.title: Task Scheduler
questions.prompt: Given tasks and cooldown n, return the least number of time units to finish all tasks.
followups: Why is the greedy formula optimal?
How does the math solution work?
What if tasks have different cooldowns?

questions.title: Partition Equal Subset Sum
questions.prompt: Determine if an array can be partitioned into two subsets with equal sum.
followups: What is the DP state and transition?
Why is this a 0/1 knapsack problem?

questions.title: Gas Station
questions.prompt: Find the starting gas station index to complete a circular tour.
followups: Why can you skip intermediate indices?

questions.title: Copy List with Random Pointer
questions.prompt: Deep copy a linked list where each node has a random pointer.
followups: Compare O(n) space vs O(1) space approaches?
How does the interweaving technique work?
What about cycles in random pointers?

questions.title: Sort Colors (Dutch National Flag)
questions.prompt: Sort an array of 0s, 1s, and 2s in one pass with O(1) space.
followups: What invariants do the three pointers maintain?
Why is this O(n) and one-pass?
How would you generalize to k colors?

questions.title: Kth Smallest Element in a BST
questions.prompt: Find the kth smallest element in a binary search tree.
followups: What property of BST does this use?
How would you handle frequent modifications?

questions.title: Binary Tree Right Side View
questions.prompt: Return the values visible from the right side of a binary tree.
followups: How about the left side view?

questions.title: Flatten Binary Tree to Linked List
questions.prompt: Flatten a binary tree to a linked list in-place (preorder order).
followups: How do you do it iteratively?
What is the Morris traversal approach?

questions.title: Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder
questions.prompt: Build a binary tree from preorder and inorder traversal arrays.
followups: How do you find the root in inorder?
What is the time complexity with hashmap optimization?

questions.title: Construct Binary Tree from Inorder and Postorder
questions.prompt: Build a binary tree from inorder and postorder traversal arrays.
followups: How does this differ from preorder+inorder?

questions.title: Path Sum II
questions.prompt: Return all root-to-leaf paths that sum to a target.
followups: How do you track the current path?
How would you handle negative values?

questions.title: Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node
questions.prompt: Connect each node to its next right node in a perfect binary tree.
followups: How do you solve with O(1) extra space?
How does level traversal without queue work?

questions.title: Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node II
questions.prompt: Same as above but the tree may not be perfect.
followups: How do you traverse levels without a queue?

questions.title: Design Circular Queue
questions.prompt: Implement a circular queue with fixed capacity.
followups: How do you differentiate full vs empty?
How would you make it thread-safe?

questions.title: Daily Temperatures
questions.prompt: Given daily temperatures, return days until warmer temperature.
followups: Why is a monotonic decreasing stack efficient?
How would you solve with brute force first?

questions.title: Minimum Path Sum
questions.prompt: Find the minimum sum path from top-left to bottom-right in a grid.
followups: What if you can move in all four directions?

questions.title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
questions.prompt: Find the length of the longest strictly increasing subsequence.
followups: Compare O(nÂ²) DP vs O(n log n) patience sorting?
How would you reconstruct the subsequence?

questions.title: Coin Change II
questions.prompt: Count the number of combinations to make up an amount with unlimited coins.
followups: How does this differ from Coin Change I?
Why does the loop order matter?

questions.title: Maximum Product Subarray
questions.prompt: Find the contiguous subarray with the maximum product.
followups: Why do you need to track both max and min?
How do you handle zeros and negatives?

questions.title: Partition Labels
questions.prompt: Partition a string into as many parts as possible so each letter appears in at most one part.
followups: How do you track last occurrences?

followups: What did you learn from the experience?

followups: How did you adapt your approach?

questions.title: Google Interview: Ambiguity
questions.prompt: Tell me about a time you had to make progress on a project with unclear requirements.
followups: How did you validate your approach?

questions.title: Google Interview: Leadership
questions.prompt: Tell me about a time you took initiative to solve a problem without being asked.

questions.title: Google Interview: Failure
